org.qualitune.naoservice.client
Class Nao.ALVideoDevice

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.Nao.ALVideoDevice
Enclosing class:
Nao
public static final class Nao.ALVideoDevice
extends java.lang.Object

ALVideoDevice, formerly called Video Input Module (V.I.M.), is architectured in order to provide every module related to vision, called Generic Video Module (G.V.M.), a direct access to raw images from video source, or an access to images transformed in the requested format.

getDirectRawImageLocal

public org.json.JSONObject getDirectRawImageLocal(java.lang.String id)
Returns a pointer to a locked ALImage, with data array pointing directly to raw data. No format conversion and no copy of the raw buffer.

Parameters:
id - Name under which the G.V.M. is known from ALVideoDevice.
Actual SDK return value: Pointer to the locked image buffer, NULL if error. Warning, image pointer is valid only for C++ dynamic library.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

recordVideo

public org.json.JSONObject recordVideo(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String path,
                                       int totalnumber,
                                       int period)
BETA - background record of an .arv raw format video from the images processed by a G.V.M.

Parameters:
id - Name under which the G.V.M. is known from the V.I.M.
path - path/name of the video to be recorded
totalNumber - number of images to be recorded. 0xFFFFFFFF for \"unlimited\"
period - one image recorded every pPeriod images
Actual SDK return value: true if success
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

subscribe

public org.json.JSONObject subscribe(java.lang.String gvmname,
                                     int resolution,
                                     int colorspace,
                                     int fps)
Register to ALVideoDevice (formerly Video Input Module/V.I.M.). When a General Video Module(G.V.M.) registers to ALVideoDevice, a buffer of the requested image format is added to the buffers list.

Parameters:
gvmName - Name of the registering G.V.M.
resolution - Resolution requested. { 0 = kQQVGA, 1 = kQVGA, 2 = kVGA }
colorSpace - Colorspace requested. { 0 = kYuv, 9 = kYUV422, 10 = kYUV, 11 = kRGB, 12 = kHSY, 13 = kBGR }
fps - Fps (frames per second) requested. { 5, 10, 15, 30 }
Actual SDK return value: Name under which the G.V.M. is known from ALVideoDevice, 0 if failed.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

unsubscribe

public org.json.JSONObject unsubscribe(java.lang.String id)
Used to unregister a G.V.M. from ALVideoDevice.

Parameters:
id - Name under which the G.V.M. is known from ALVideoDevice.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)
